heading: Venue
text:
Civil penalties may be recovered in an action in any court of appropriate jurisdiction or in a proceeding
   before the environmental control board. Such board shall have the power to impose the civil penalties provided for in this
   article. Notwithstanding the provisions of section six hundred sixty-six of the charter, a notice of violation issued by the
   department pursuant to this article shall not be subject to review by the board of standards and appeals.
